text:
League 1
ASSE: a first for Zaydou Youssouf!
A few hours before the match against Oleksandria in Europa League, the middle of the AS Saint-Etienne was called by Sylvain Ripoll, the matches of the French Team Hopefuls.
07 Nov 2019, 15:40 by Charlie Creteur
Performing in recent weeks with the Greens, midfielder Zaydou Youssouf has just been rewarded for his efforts. Purchased 2M ‚Ç¨ this summer from Bordeaux, the St√©phanois was called for the first time with the French Team Espoirs. Thus he will take part in the meetings of the Blueberries against Georgia (November 15) and Switzerland (November 19). He will also meet one of his teammates in the person of Arnaud Nordin.
